video_prompt: A fluffy, anthropomorphic ginger cat in a bustling market walks, its head slightly tilted, eyes tracking an elevated object. It holds a vegetable basket. Blurry human figures and lights move in the background.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** A fluffy, robust, ginger anthropomorphic cat, with a white belly, stands upright in a bustling indoor market, holding a green basket of vegetables. Its head is tilted slightly right, dark round eyes looking up and to the right. A tiny pink nose and long white whiskers are visible. A slab of raw meat sits on a metallic counter to the right, and a small dark green woven basket with vegetables is to the left. Vibrant green and red vegetables contrast with the cat's golden-brown fur. The background is a blurry market scene with out-of-focus figures and bright lights, emphasizing the in-focus cat. Low angle, vertical full shot.
refined_video_prompt: An anthropomorphic ginger cat strides forward, its fluffy fur subtly rippling. Its head slowly tilts upward, eyes actively tracking an elevated, unseen object with a curious gaze. The vegetable basket it carries sways gently with each step. In the background, blurry human figures flow past in constant motion, their forms shifting. Distant lights streak and flicker, creating a dynamic, bustling market environment.
